tutorials.title: Set up R and RStudio
tutorials.description: Learn how to install R and rstudio on your windows, linux or mac. Follow this tutorial on setting up r studio and how to add r to windows path.

tutorials.title: Cheatsheet for LaTeX Math Commands
tutorials.description: Download our LaTeX math cheat sheet and learn the most important AMS-Math LaTeX commands. View our overview for mathematical expressions, Greek letters and more

tutorials.title: Set up Make
tutorials.description: Learn how to install make on windows, mac, and Linux. Use make to automate the execution of projects, and see how to check if make is installed correctly

tutorials.title: Configuring Python for Web Scraping
tutorials.description: Learn to web scrape using ChromeDriver, Selenium, and Webdriver manager for python. Web scraping using an automated browser by installing ChromeDrive

tutorials.title: Use ChatGPT for your research!
tutorials.description: Currently, ChatGPT is everywhere. Learn how to use it efficiently to improve your research.

building_blocks.title: Making transcriptions using OpenAI's Whisper 3 mins
building_blocks.description: Guidance page for using Whisper for translations and transcriptions

building_blocks.title: Document New Data
building_blocks.description: If your project contains data that has been newly created, learn how to include a documentation of that data in your project.

building_blocks.title: Use Scrum In Your Team
building_blocks.description: Discover Scrum to improve your project management when working on empirical research projects

building_blocks.title: Git Branching Strategies
building_blocks.description: Explore three popular Git branching strategies: Trunk-Based Development, Feature Branching, and Git Flow. Learn their workflow, strengths, weaknesses and suitable projects and teams.

building_blocks.title: GitHub Copilot in RStudio
building_blocks.description: Learning what GitHub Copilot is, how and why it can be used

reproducible.title: Extract Data From APIs
reproducible.description: Learn how to extract data from APIs.

reproducible.title: Avoid Getting Blocked While Scraping
reproducible.description: Take steps to make sure your scraper keeps on running!

learn.title: Online Data Collection and Management
learn.description: Learn to use web scraping and APIs to collect data for your empirical research project.

learn.title: Web Scraping and API Mining
learn.description: Learn to extract data from the web and APIs
